Package Servidor

Class MediaManipulator

java.lang.Object
Servidor.MediaManipulator
public class MediaManipulator extends Object
The MediaManipulator class provides methods to retrieve and manage media files from specific directories within a files folder. This includes methods to list music files, videos, and documents.
